title: OpenConstruction Object & Class Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary (SKOS-like) for object/class labels observed in OpenConstruction dataset catalogs. Includes explicit category assignments, synonyms (altLabels), and optional broader/narrower relations.

categories.label: Activities & States
categories.description: Actions, motions, process states, and activity labels that appear as ‘classes’ in some datasets.
categories.pattern: \b(idle|swing|load|dump\b|move\b|fill\b|walk\b|stand\b|fall\b|talk\b|climb\b|wear\b|site preparation|active construction|post construction|unknown|production activities|unsafe activities|awkward activities|common activities|other activities)\b

categories.label: Background/Other
categories.description: Background/void/other labels used in segmentation datasets.

categories.label: Building Components
categories.description: Architectural components and assemblies (openings, façade parts, prefabricated elements).

categories.label: Construction Equipment
categories.description: Heavy equipment and machinery used on construction and earthmoving sites.

categories.label: Defects & Damage
categories.description: Defect types (cracks, spalling, potholes, etc.) for condition assessment datasets.

categories.label: Environment & Phenomena
categories.description: Environmental or physical phenomena (smoke, dust, fire, etc.) and contextual scene factors.

categories.label: Materials
categories.description: Construction materials and surface types (including common scene materials).

categories.label: MEP & Utilities
categories.description: Mechanical, electrical, plumbing (MEP) and utility components.

categories.label: Other/Uncategorized
categories.description: Terms that do not match current category rules; keep explicit assignments here until refined.

categories.label: People
categories.description: Human subjects commonly labeled in site imagery, safety datasets, and pose/activity datasets.

categories.label: Personal Protective Equipment
categories.description: Safety gear and PPE items (e.g., hard hats, vests, harnesses) used in construction safety monitoring.

categories.label: Signs & Safety Controls
categories.description: Traffic control devices, safety barriers, signage, and site control elements.
categories.pattern: \b(fence|slogan|board|traffic signal|light pole|road sign|advertising board|road divider|zebra crossing|bus stop|safety cone|opening hole|fire exit sign|fire door sign|fire equipment sign)\b

categories.label: Structural Elements
categories.description: Load-bearing or structural building elements often represented in drawings/BIM or segmentation.

categories.label: Tools & Handheld Items
categories.description: Hand tools, attachments, and small handheld items.

categories.label: Vehicles
categories.description: Road or site vehicles and trucks (including dump trucks and mixers when labeled as vehicles).

terms.prefLabel: No Damage Or Very Minor Damage
